text: nam itine arabiyallatta marretenkilum bhasayile khur'an akkiyirunnuvenkil avar parayumayirunnu: "entukeant itile vacanannal vyaktamayi visadamakkappetunnilla? grantham anarabiyum pravacakan arabiyumavukayea?" parayuka: satyavisvasikalkk it vyaktamaya valikattiyan. phalavattaya samanesadhavum. visvasikkattavarkkea, avarute katukalute kelvi ketuttikkalayunnatan. kannukalute kalca nasippikkunnatum. etea viduratayil ninnu vilikkunnatupeale avyaktamaya viliyayan avarkkanubhavappetuka
